fullplot: This first film version of "The Children's Hour" uses a heterosexual triangle rather than the play's lesbian theme. The plot concerns schoolteachers Karen Wright and Martha Dobie, both of whom are in love with Dr. Joe Cardin. The malicious lie of one of their students involves all three in a scandal which disrupts all their lives.
plot: Two school teachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.
title: These Three
writers: Lillian Hellman (original story and screen play)
